Description: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Gives the slotted power a chance of giving the Tanker a small amount of damage absorption for a short time and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This effect will trigger roughly 2 times per minute.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Tankers and may be slotted into any Tanker damage power.
